data.description:
"The best archery game available for VR" - Forbes
"One of the best looking Quest games" - The Verge

The best VR archery game on Quest gets even better! 
New Game Modes, Seasons, Tournaments, weapon skins, and graphics upgrades that push the limits of Quest 2.

Battle through the floating castles of medieval fantasy to restore Harmony in Desolation, Heaven, Purgatory & Hell. Rain down arrows against forsaken souls and angelic creatures that have taken over the afterlife.

A great Roguelite on Quest with excellent replay value that adapts to the player’s skill level. Four beautiful, mysterious, and procedurally generated worlds with infinite replayability. Three epic boss fights. Explore multiple secret areas to unlock extra loot.

The gate-defense game mode “Siege of Heaven” is perfect for new players, casual VR enthusiasts, and advanced players alike. 

Enjoy VR’s highest-rated bow & arrow mechanics.

It’s official! Summer Season 2023 starts now! 

With the previous season closed, all the leaderboards have now been reset and Legend Points have been rewarded. Once again, the fight for the best scores begins!

There’s no time to waste - grab your bows and dive into a refreshed version of In Death: Unchained! The leaderboards will not fill themselves!

Version 1.6.5

The Abyss Trials starts now! 

Prepare yourselves for a week full of challenges and climbing up the leaderboards to earn extra Legend Points.

Remember that you can enter the event with the portal in Sanctuary that will lead you to the tournament lobby. You can have as many tries as you wish until December 20th. 
All the necessary info can be found on our social media channels.

Grab your bows and good luck!

The leaderboards have been reset & Legend Points awarded. The fight for the best scores begins again!

Version 1.6.1
 
Archers!

Season 6 starts now! 
The leaderboards have been reset & Legend Points awarded. The fight for the best scores begins again!

Important Updates:
- Mortal : a newly added Sigil that has replaced Runner, just as you asked! 
- You can now play In Death: Unchained in your native language!
We’ve added German, French, Spanish, Italian, Polish, Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages to the game. All you need to do is change the language via the Settings menu and voila. Now you can feel even more at home in the afterlife.

The full list of changes:
- Localizations: you can now change game language in Settings
  Available languages: German, French, Spanish, Italian, Polish, Chinese, Japanese and Korean
- New Demonic Sigil: Mortal, which replaces Runner
- Balance changes
  Main game
     - Increased enemy damage by 1 every cycle instead of every other cycle. 
       Example: cycles 5,6,7,8,9 instead of 5,7,9,11,13
     - Increased maximum enemy damage to 12 (attainable on cycle 15)
- Fletcher (Demonic Sigil)
     - Increased health drops by 1 for pits & boss fights
- Fixed: Gabriel fight - player can hide from Gabriel in the crack below the boss arena
- A few minor fixes

Season 5 will end on November 21, 2022, 5AM PST/ 2PM CET.

Before Season 5 ends remember to:
    - finish up your main game run to save your score
    - update the game when new version becomes available
    - take some time to prepare for the next Season leaderboard top score race!

Version 1.5.12

Dear Players, 
 
Seeing such positive feedback from you and hearing all the heartwarming words, we’ve decided to keep the Demonic Sigils as a permanent feature of the game! Starting today, you will have a chance to challenge yourself with each of the sigils - Purist, Runner and Fletcher, whenever you wish.

- Demonic Sigils are staying in the game as a permanent feature
- Once unlocked, the Sigil panel can be found in Sanctuary
- You will have to unlock each Sigil first with achievements
- Each Sigil will have its own Leaderboard and will be played with your own achievement progress
- Main game run and all Sigil runs can be played independently
- Demonic Sigils leaderboards will also award Legend Points at the end of a season

If you still have any questions or doubts regarding this new information, don’t hesitate and write to us:
https://www.facebook.com/SuperbrightVR
